shortBio: Karmant is an underground thrash metal band from Dhaka, Bangladesh, formed in 2016.
longBio: Karmant is an independent thrash metal band hailing from Dhaka, Bangladesh. Formed in 2016, the band has been active in the underground metal scene, delivering raw and uncompromising thrash metal. In April 2021, Karmant released their debut EP 'Riot in Uniform', featuring four tracks: Nuclear Outbreak, Riot in Uniform, Greed, and General Destroyer.
keyFacts: Debut release: Riot in Uniform EP (2021)
